title: Roommate wanted at La Plaine Stade de France
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Roommate wanted at house with 2 other roommates, 1 from Syria, 1 italian-american; room features hardwood floors, plenty of closets, large bed, all linens are supplied. It's on first floor of house facing west so there's plenty of natural light. In the house you have access to fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and courtyard. We are looking for a non smoking, clean and respectful roommate.  Senior citizen preferred.
5 mn walking to RER B La Plaine Stade de France and 400m from canal Saint Denis. Neighboorhood is very safe and especially extremely quiet.
Rent is first and last, so €1,000 to move in. 1 year lease.
Visits start now but it'll be available on April 1st. 

Please call Mike at 07 58 39 44 50 (also on whatsApp) to schedule a visit.
